title: Set alias for columns in data set but in expression builder still shows the old columns name when selecting the dataset
OB: When selecting a dataset in the expression builder, the old column names are displayed instead of the set aliases.
EB: The expression builder should display the set aliases for the columns when selecting a dataset.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Create a new datasource and dataset. 2. Set the alias of the first column in the dataset to 'column1'. 3. Insert a data item and bind it to the dataset. 4. Open the expression builder and select the dataset.
